author: marcsaeg
msg: Changed readResponseBody() to use new implementation in HttpMethodBase

author: marcsaeg
msg: Added getPath() method.  This is used by the HttpUrlMethod classes.

author: marcsaeg
msg: 2)  Fixed handling of 100 response after the body was sent.
3)  Support for relative URIs in Location: header in non-strict mode.
4)  Always recreate cookie headers.  A redirect may have added new cookies
5)  Updated readResponseBody() to handle servers that send bodies without
6)  Added a readResponseBody() method that takes an OutputStream.  Derived
classes can now more easily use the readResponseBody() method from the base

author: marcsaeg
msg: Added setStrictMode() and getStringMode().  The strict mode code is
still experimental, but since it is currently only available through
HttpMultiClient it won't impact existing code.
